'''Beneath the Abandoned House''' is a [[Quest Domain]] encountered during the [[World Quest]] ''[[Where the Dandelions Find Rest]]''.

==Steps==
# Glide down into the room and defeat the enemies. {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire;Nobushi: Kikouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban}}
# Go into the corridor and get the '''first amulet''' from the altar.
# Open the door and go into the next room with the floor gate.
# Go down the stairs and defeat the enemies. {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Kikouban;Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban}}
# Use the lever near the blue flags to bring down the ladder.
# Climb up the ladders and defeat the enemy. {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban*1}}
# Go into the southern room and get the '''second amulet'''.
# Go back to the room with the floor gate (see step 3).
# Use the lever to open the floor gate.
# Glide down into the room and defeat the enemies. {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard}}
# Get the '''third amulet''' from the altar.
# Go to the eastern wall and choose "Knock Once".
# Go south and use the floor elevator to go up.
# Defeat the enemies. {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban}}
# Open the door with the amulets.
# Go into the room to start a cut scene.
# Defeat the enemies to obtain Cell Key. {{Enemy List|Fatui Pyro Agent*1|text=Ilyin}} {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard*1|text=Pavel}} {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban}}
#* You can deactivate the armor to remove their buffs.
# Go back to the eastern wall of the room with the third amulet (see step 12).
# Choose "Open", followed by "Move" to unlock and open the cell door.
